name: FBar Social
author: Ngan Tengyuen, Simu, Maruf, and Md.khroshed Alam

sections.description:
FBar Social plugin is a social sticky header bar for wordpress that magically appears at a specific pixel.

Demo

For demo, please visit the official site and scroll down at http://www.geckoandfly.com/fbar-social-wordpress-plugin/

Usage

No widget and no codes to add to your theme, just activate the plugin and make the necessary changes to the settings.

Acknowledgements

Special thanks go to Simu, Maruf, and Md.khroshed Alam of RS Soft.

License

This plugin is Free Software, released and licensed under the GPL, version 2 (http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html).
You may use it free of charge for any purpose.
It would be great if you blog about it by linking it to the official blog (www.geckoandfly.com)
sections.installation:
The easiest way to install FBar Social is via your WordPress Dashboard. Go to the “Plugins” page and search for “FBar” in the WordPress Plugin Directory. Then click “Install Now” and the following steps will be done for you automatically. You’ll just have to activate FBar Social.

Manual installation works just as for other WordPress plugins:

  1. Download and extract the ZIP file and move the folder “fbar” into the “wp-content/plugins/” directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin “fbar” on the “Plugins” page of your WordPress Dashboard.
  3. Make changes to the settings and let the magic begins.

Requirements?

In short: WordPress 3.5 or higher, while the latest version of WordPress is always recommended.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.2

Bugs fixes, fix unable to save settings error

Version 1.1

Bugs fixes

Version 1.0

Official release after fixing all the bugs and have it installed on all of my blogs with many enhancements and improvements.
